name: carcophony
description:
Carcophony is the NEW, FREE puzzler, featuring classic frantic and strategic gameplay designed for today’s touch and swipe controls, which combine to produce a satisfying feeling of (traffic) flow.

***carcophony does not support iPhone 3GS, iPod Touch 3rd Generation or earlier devices***

There’s panic on the streets again. But don’t just wonder to yourself. Bring order to the traffic chaos in this addictively fun and increasingly challenging traffic management game.

SURVIVAL MODE
•How long can you keep the traffic moving?
•Create optimal traffic flows on 5 tactically-different road network layouts.
•Deal with increasingly difficult waves of incoming cars.
•Score big with non-stop colour streaks, ambulance bonuses and other added surprises.

CHALLENGE MODE
•Can you clear the traffic jam in time?
•64 increasingly difficult bite-sized puzzles (with many more to follow shortly)
•Featuring number-of-moves based puzzles, time based puzzles, and both!
•Replay to direct traffic differently for a more optimal result. Every second/tap counts.

KEY FEATURES
•Mind-bending multi-tasking gameplay – control multiple junctions to keep traffic flowing.
•Earn power-ups and upgrades to turbo boost your cars or remove pesky obstacles.
•Unlock new, unique car designs including trucks and tanks.
•Dynamic in-game online leaderboards and achievements.
•A uniquely English feel through the UK’s road signage and automotive pioneers high-scorers.

PRESS
•"carcophony is one of those games that you just have to put your hands on your hips, pull up your zip and say, Wow - that's absolute genius", Robert Florence.
